LanguageData.Miho_Child_HuntFoxFive.title: hunting fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_HuntFoxFive.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an amazing hunter. No one knows what is so amazing about {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_DesertFive.title: desert fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_DesertFive.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was literally a desert fox. {PAWN_pronoun} can tolerate heat very well.
